clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: 90 days notice period required for contract termination.

clauses.title: Liability Cap
clauses.summary: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees.

clauses.title: Data Security
clauses.summary: SOC 2 Type II compliance required at all times.

clauses.title: Service Level Agreement
clauses.summary: 99.9% uptime guarantee with penalties for downtime.

insights.message: Liability cap excludes data breach costs, potentially exposing significant financial risk.
Auto-renews unless cancelled 60 days before expiry date.
Standard termination clauses align with industry best practices.

evidence.snippet: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees paid under this Agreement.
Either party may terminate with 90 days written notice.
This Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one-year terms.

clauses.title: Penalty Clauses
clauses.summary: Service credits for downtime exceeding SLA.

clauses.title: Equipment Ownership
clauses.summary: Provider retains ownership of all network equipment.

insights.message: Contract expires in 30 days with no renewal terms negotiated.
Service interruption risk if contract lapses.
Equipment removal required if contract terminates.

evidence.snippet: Service availability shall be maintained at no less than 99.5% uptime.
All equipment remains property of TelNet throughout the term.
